void kb_parse (int soc, struct arglist *globals, struct kb_item **kb, char *buf, int msg)
 Modifies the knowledge base or sends content of a kb item.

Function Documentation

void kb_parse ( int  soc,
struct arglist *  globals,
struct kb_item **  kb,
char *  buf,
int  msg 
)

Modifies the knowledge base or sends content of a kb item.

If the knowledge base is going to be saved to disc, modify the entry on the file system, too.

Parameters:
soc "Internal" socket to the child process that queries the kb or requests modification.
msg Explicitly handled if INTERNAL_COMM_KB_GET, INTERNAL_COMM_KB_REPLACE (defined in plugutils.h)
